title: Accordion
description: The Accordion component allows users to show and hide sections of related content on a page.

title: Alert
description: The Alert component displays important messages to users with different severity levels.

title: Avatar
description: The Avatar component displays user profile images with fallback initials, status indicators, and various styling options.

title: Avatar Group
description: The AvatarGroup component displays multiple avatars in an overlapping stack with a counter for additional avatars.

title: Badge
description: The Badge component is used to display small pieces of information like status, count, or labels.

title: Breadcrumb
description: The Breadcrumb component provides navigation context showing the user's location within the application hierarchy.

title: Button
description: The Button component provides clickable elements for user interactions with various styles and states.

title: Card
description: The Card component provides a flexible container for displaying content in a structured format.

title: Checkbox Input
description: The CheckboxInput component provides checkbox functionality for selecting single or multiple options, with indeterminate state support.

title: FileUpload
description: The FileUpload component provides a flexible file upload interface with support for drag-and-drop, file validation, preview, and two display modes (dropzone and text input).

title: Modal
description: The Modal component provides overlay dialogs for important user interactions and information.

title: Offcanvas
description: The Offcanvas component provides a sliding panel for displaying hidden content like menus or sidebars that slide in from the side.

title: Pagination
description: The Pagination component provides navigation controls for paginated content, supporting both simplified and full pagination modes with customizable appearance.

title: Radio Input
description: The RadioInput component allows users to choose one option from a list of mutually exclusive choices.

title: Select Input
description: The SelectInput component provides a dropdown interface for selecting one or multiple options from a list.

title: Skeleton
description: The Skeleton component displays a placeholder preview of content before the actual data is loaded, improving perceived performance and user experience.

title: Spinner
description: The Spinner component displays an animated loading indicator with customizable size, color, duration, and thickness.

title: Table
description: The Table component provides a flexible and feature-rich data table with support for custom rendering, row selection, striping, sticky headers, and responsive design.

title: Textarea
description: The Textarea component provides a multi-line text input with optional auto-resize functionality, label, error messages, and dark mode support.

title: Text Input
description: The TextInput component provides a text input field for users to enter textual information such as names, emails, or any short form data.

title: Toast
description: The Toast component provides brief, auto-dismissable messages to inform users about actions or status updates.

title: Toggle
description: The Toggle component provides an animated switch control for toggling between on/off states with various visual styles and sizes.

title: Tooltip
description: The Tooltip component displays informative text when hovering over an element, with customizable placement, styling, and animation options.
